pullRequest.body:
This PR defines finite morphisms of schemes.

### PR summary [e217635fef](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/18357/commits/e217635fef8d5e4ea9acedb9162ebe1049c6ace4)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.Finite`|1778|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ HasAffineProperty.affineAnd_eq_of_propertyIsLocal`
`+ HasAffineProperty.affineAnd_le_affineAnd`
`+ IsFinite`
`+ finite_containsIdentities`
`+ instance (priority := 900) [IsIso f] : IsFinite f := of_isIso @IsFinite f`
`+ instance (priority := 900) [hf : IsFinite f] : LocallyOfFiniteType f := by`
`+ instance : ContainsIdentities @IsFinite`
`+ instance : HasAffineProperty @IsFinite (fun X _ f _ â†¦ IsAffine X âˆ§ RingHom.Finite (f.app âŠ¤)) := by`
`+ instance : IsMultiplicative @IsFinite`
`+ instance : IsStableUnderBaseChange @IsFinite`
`+ instance : IsStableUnderComposition @IsFinite`
`+ instance {Z : Scheme.{u}} (g : Y âŸ¶ Z) [IsFinite f] [IsFinite g] : IsFinite (f â‰« g)`
`+ targetAffineLocally_affineAnd_eq_affineLocally`
`+ targetAffineLocally_affineAnd_iff'`
`+ targetAffineLocally_affineAnd_iff_affineLocally`
`+ targetAffineLocally_affineAnd_le`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:

```
</details>

</details>

This looks good to me but there's a merge conflict.

Thanks!
maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by erdOne.

Thanks!

bors d+

:v: chrisflav can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Thanks for the reviews!

bors r+
Can you please fix the conflict and merge it? Thanks!

Thanks for the heads up Riccardo! I didn't realize the merge did not go through.

bors r+
:-1: Rejected by label
bors r+

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11798330753/job/32864252843)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11798330753/job/32864253221)

We should in general have targetAffineLocally (affineAnd P) => targetAffineLocally (affineAnd Q) = IsAffineHom + affineLocally Q
if Q is local and P => Q.
Do we still need this?
No, good catch. This is an oversight.

```suggestion
instance : HasAffineProperty @IsFinite fun X Y f _ â†¦ IsAffine X âˆ§ RingHom.Finite (f.app âŠ¤) := by
```
Oops missed this.
I don't think we should expose `affineAnd` to end users.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicGeometry/Morphisms): finite morphisms
